name: Beach Cleanup at Nassau
description: Join us for a morning of fun and community service as we work together to clean up the beautiful beaches of Nassau. Our goal is to keep our shorelines litter-free and safe for wildlife.
summary: Join us for a morning of beach cleanup in Nassau!

name: Habitat for Humanity Build in Freeport
address: E West Sun Highway, Freeport, Bahamas
description: Join Habitat for Humanity in building safe and affordable homes for families in need. No prior construction experience is necessary, just a willingness to help and have fun.
summary: Help build homes for families in need with Habitat for Humanity!

name: Food Drive in Nassau
description: Join us as we collect and distribute food to those in need in the Nassau community. Every little bit helps, so come out and make a difference with us!
summary: Help us make a difference by participating in our food drive in Nassau!

name: Beach Cleanup in Pattaya
address: Pattaya Beach Rd, Pattaya, Chonburi, Thailand
description: Join us for a day of fun in the sun as we work together to clean up Pattaya beach. All supplies will be provided, just bring a positive attitude and a willingness to make a difference!
summary: Make a difference in your community and join us for a beach cleanup in Pattaya!

name: Community Garden Initiative in Chiang Mai
address: Chang Khlan Rd, Tambon Hai Ya, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai, Thailand
description: Join us in creating a community garden in Chiang Mai. This initiative will provide fresh produce for those in need, as well as bring the community together for a good cause.
summary: Help us create a better future for our community by joining our community garden initiative in Chiang Mai!

name: Homeless Outreach in Cape Town
address: Green Point, Cape Town, South Africa
description: Join us in reaching out to those in need in Cape Town. We'll be distributing food, clothing, and other necessities to those living on the streets.
summary: Help us make a difference in the lives of those in need by joining our homeless outreach in Cape Town!

name: Animal Shelter Fundraiser in Cape Town
address: Long Street, Cape Town, South Africa
description: Join us in supporting the animals of Cape Town by participating in our animal shelter fundraiser. All proceeds will go directly to helping care for animals in need.
summary: Make a difference in the lives of animals in need by joining our animal shelter fundraiser in Cape Town!

name: Animal Care
address: 18 Annotto Bay Road, Annotto Bay, Jamaica
description: For many Jamaicans living in low-income communities, food is scarce and cannot be spared to feed animals, even pets. This means many animals, especially dogs, are abandoned on the streets and left to fend for themselves. With this lack of food and care they often end up ill or injured. Volunteers can help address this issue by assisting at dog shelters that care for hundreds of dogs at a time. The aim is to rehabilitate the dogs and give them the best chance of being rehomed.
summary: Join us in our effort to rehabilitate stray dogs and give them the best chance of being rehomed.

name: Child and Youth Development
address: 18 Annotto Bay Road, Annotto Bay, Jamaica
description: Inspired to make a difference as a Child and Youth Development volunteer in Jamaica? International Volunteer HQ’s Child and Youth Development project is a fantastic opportunity to make a difference in a country that stigmatizes mental health and faces many challenges associated with poverty.
summary: For those with a passion for promoting wellness among young people, volunteers help to work through mental health and emotional understanding, running workshops to equip students with the tools to deal with the challenges of growing up.

name: Sustainable Agriculture
description: Gain agricultural experience and help local farmers to meet the challenges presented by growing environmental pressures and urbanization.
summary: Get your hands dirty as you support this environmental volunteer project alongside local farmers. Assist in implementing contemporary and forward-looking farming practices to help combat the challenges of growing environmental pressures.

name: Construction and Renovation
address: Calle 11, Ave. 2, San Jose, Costa Rica
description: Ready to take up the tools and be a Construction and Renovation volunteer in Costa Rica - San José? International Volunteer HQ’s Construction and Renovation project enables volunteers to lend a hand and a hammer to community initiatives that often lack the funds, labor and supplies to get the work done.
summary: Assist a locally run organization that helps under-funded construction projects through to completion. Projects include childcare facilities, community spaces and local clinics.

name: Teaching English
description: Want to volunteer to Teach English in Guatemala? International Volunteer HQ’s Teaching English project enables volunteers to gain teaching experience in schools, community centers and libraries.
summary: Help to facilitate free English classes for children and adults, fostering better language skills and increased opportunities for your students.

name: Marine Conservation
address: #2 North Front Street, Belize City, Belize
description: Ready to dive into a new adventure as a Marine Conservation volunteer in Belize? International Volunteer HQ’s Marine Conservation project is set on a tiny private island in the Caribbean where volunteers have the opportunity to help conserve and preserve the stunning marine environment.
summary: Based on a stunning small island in the Caribbean, help local scientists with a range of scuba diving tasks to conserve the environment and protect marine life.

name: Sustainable Farming
address: Via del Corso, 53, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
description: Volunteer alongside asylum seekers in one of Rome’s historic parks. Assist in the cultivation of vegetable gardens, caring for plant nurseries, maintaining a botanical collection of Mediterranean plants, urban gardens and supporting with manufacturing and craft activities.
summary: Curious about Sustainable Farming volunteering in Italy - Rome? International Volunteer HQ’s Sustainable Farming project empowers volunteers to get their hands dirty at one of Rome’s many farms and parks. Volunteers may have the opportunity to work side by side with migrants, refugees and asylum seekers, as well as with people with disabilities, the elderly and even children.

name: Special Needs Support
description: Help in care centers for people with special needs, supporting local staff and helping to organize and run games, fun activities and learning exercises.
summary: Inspired to be a Special Needs Support volunteer in Croatia? International Volunteer HQ’s Special Needs project gives volunteers the opportunity to assist in care centers for children, teenagers and adults with a wide range of physical and mental disabilities. Volunteers will gain experience caring for people with special needs and help them become more accepted and less stigmatized in their communities, improving their overall quality of life.

name: Animal Care
description: Help rescue and care for abandoned cats, dogs, chickens, and other animals in need at shelters in Siem Reap.
summary: Want to look after our furry friends as an Animal Care volunteer in Cambodia? International Volunteer HQ’s Animal Care project gives you the opportunity to support local animal shelters in Siem Reap. Volunteers help rescue, provide companionship, and care for neglected cats, dogs, chickens, and other animals in need. Practicing vets or veterinary students may also have the opportunity to assist with medical treatments and minor surgeries.

name: Medical
address: Đồng Khởi, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Shadow and assist local doctors and nurses in a Vietnamese hospital, helping with basic tasks and triage.
summary: Interested in Medical volunteering in Vietnam? International Volunteer HQ’s Medical project presents a fantastic opportunity for medical students to learn about the healthcare system in Vietnam. Volunteers will gain medical experience by observing and assisting qualified local staff in a hospital in Ho Chi Minh City, getting exposure to a range of different specialties, treatments and clinical practices.

name: Environmental Conservation
address: 81/3 Soi Moobaan Hua Na Nong Kae, Hua Hin, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand
description: Support local conservation initiatives such as tree planting, and help educate the local community on important environmental issues.
summary: Want to help protect the planet as an Environmental volunteer in Thailand - Hua Hin? Roll up your sleeves and work alongside the local community on important conservation initiatives. You’ll have the opportunity to volunteer at national parks in the Hua Hin area and help with day-to-day tasks and activities, such as tree planting. You’ll also have the chance to help prepare the next generation to look after the planet by spreading awareness on environmental conservation and educating students at a local school.
